configuration_notice: description : You can update this file to add more language, fix miss-configuration, etc.
i18n : list of files by language key for translation
lookups : Lookups in configuration file is merged to lookups key present in translation file
data.dt : File data.dt contains static file with data in this file first field is 'l' == 'language' which used for record (so all lookups expected are translated in that language).
